ygData.subject: Wave of enfeeblement
ygData.msgSnippet: I am a lvl 13 necro adventuring in lavastorm and the first part of Najena and I have a few questions on the level 12 spells.  Does anyone use wave
ygData.messageBody:
I am a lvl 13 necro adventuring in lavastorm and the first part of Najena and I have a few questions on the level 12 spells. Does anyone use wave enfeeblement? Its an area effect spell that i was thinking of buying for use on skele and orc mobs. Noone has it that I know of and was just wondering what it does and how potent it is.

Also have some questions on robes. What would be better to go for: the gossamer (white) robe found in befallen or the black flowing robe in Najena?

Also, should I make the runed totem staff my goal for a new weapon or is there something else out there for a necro?

Also, If I were to buy these items, anybody have an idea of a fair price?

Grymspine
